original_title: David French Is a Piece of Shit and I Want Him Dead
overview: Brothers Dean and Anthony form the up and coming rock band Bad Penny with their friend James as lead guitarist and singer and are doing their first headline tour. On their tour they brought along a support band called French Kiss, which is fronted by a charming singer called David French. To the brothers disgust French Kiss is becoming more popular than them and they devise an evil plan to make their band gain popularity again.
title: David French Is a Piece of Shit and I Want Him Dead
